Protocols/AbstractPlaceholderService.htm.name: provide(superview:field:)
Protocols/AbstractPlaceholderService.htm.abstract: Method setups input field (textField or textView) with superview on your placeholder.

Protocols/AbstractPlaceholderService.htm.name: setup(placeholder:)
Protocols/AbstractPlaceholderService.htm.abstract: Method allows you to setup some string in your placeholder.

Protocols/AbstractPlaceholderService.htm.name: configurePlaceholder(fieldState:containerState:)
Protocols/AbstractPlaceholderService.htm.abstract: Method allows you to configure placeholder initial state.

Protocols/AbstractPlaceholderService.htm.name: updateContent(fieldState:containerState:)
Protocols/AbstractPlaceholderService.htm.abstract: Method allows you to configure placeholder for appropriate state.

Protocols/AbstractPlaceholderService.htm.name: update(useIncreasedRightPadding:fieldState:)
Protocols/AbstractPlaceholderService.htm.abstract: This method will be called when you add/remove additional action button.

Protocols/AbstractPlaceholderService.htm.name: updateAfterTextChanged(fieldState:)
Protocols/AbstractPlaceholderService.htm.abstract: This method will be called when user enter some text in field, but state of field doesn’t changed.

Protocols/RespondableField.html#/s:17Tex.name: nextInput
Protocols/RespondableField.html#/s:17Tex.abstract: Next responder, next field which will be activated with next button on keyboard or toolbar.

Protocols/RespondableField.html#/s:17Tex.name: previousInput
Protocols/RespondableField.html#/s:17Tex.abstract: Previous responder, previous field which will be activated with previous button on custom tollbar view from this library.

Protocols/RespondableField.html#/s:17Tex.name: isFirstResponder
Protocols/RespondableField.html#/s:17Tex.abstract: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether this object is the first responder.

Protocols/RespondableField.html#/s:17Tex.name: becomeFirstResponder()
Protocols/RespondableField.html#/s:17Tex.abstract: Asks UIKit to make this object the first responder in its window.

Protocols/DateTextField.html.name: DateTextField
Protocols/DateTextField.html.abstract: Protocols for text field which can communicate with DatePickerView as its inputView

Protocols/GuidedTextField.html.name: GuidedTextField
Protocols/GuidedTextField.html.abstract: Protocols for manageable text field, which can switch responder or resign it

Protocols/PickerTextField.html.name: PickerTextField
Protocols/PickerTextField.html.abstract: Protocols for text field which can communicate with PlainPickerView as its inputView

Protocols/ResetableField.html.name: ResetableField
Protocols/ResetableField.html.abstract: Describes type of field which can reset its state

Protocols/RespondableField.html.name: RespondableField
Protocols/RespondableField.html.abstract: Abstract protocol that give you ability to control under responder chain for text fields.

Protocols/AbstractPlaceholderService.htm.name: AbstractPlaceholderService
Protocols/AbstractPlaceholderService.htm.abstract: Protocol for abstract service, which contains logic for drawing placeholder.

Enums/ValidationPolicy.html#/s:17TextFie.name: always
Enums/ValidationPolicy.html#/s:17TextFie.abstract: Validation always performs after text field end editing

Enums/ValidationPolicy.html#/s:17TextFie.name: notEmptyText
Enums/ValidationPolicy.html#/s:17TextFie.abstract: Validation performs if current text is not empty

Enums/ValidationPolicy.html#/s:17TextFie.name: afterChanges
Enums/ValidationPolicy.html#/s:17TextFie.abstract: Validation performs if user make some changes into the text

Enums/TextFieldPasswordModeBehavior.html.name: visibleOnNotEmptyText
Enums/TextFieldPasswordModeBehavior.html.abstract: password button visible only if text is not empty

Enums/TextFieldPasswordModeBehavior.html.name: visibleAfterFirstEntry
Enums/TextFieldPasswordModeBehavior.html.abstract: password button becomes visible after the user enters the first character,

Enums/TextFieldMode.html#/s:17TextFields.name: plain
Enums/TextFieldMode.html#/s:17TextFields.abstract: normal textField mode without any action buttons

Enums/TextFieldMode.html#/s:17TextFields.name: custom(_:)
Enums/TextFieldMode.html#/s:17TextFields.abstract: mode for textField with custom action button

Enums/NativePlaceholderBehavior.html#/s:.name: hideOnFocus
Enums/NativePlaceholderBehavior.html#/s:.abstract: placeholder will hide when user tap on the field,

Enums/NativePlaceholderBehavior.html#/s:.name: hideOnInput
Enums/NativePlaceholderBehavior.html#/s:.abstract: placeholder will hide when user enter at least one character in field

Enums/FieldContainerState.html#/s:17Text.name: error
Enums/FieldContainerState.html#/s:17Text.abstract: state for text field in error state

Enums/FormatterMasks.html.name: FormatterMasks
Enums/FormatterMasks.html.abstract: Masks for text field formatters. Rules for this masks you can see in https://github.com/RedMadRobot/input-mask-ios

Enums/ValidationPolicy.html.name: ValidationPolicy
Enums/ValidationPolicy.html.abstract: Allows you to manage validation behaviors after text field end editing

Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html#/s:17Tex.name: placeholder
Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html#/s:17Tex.abstract: Property allows you to install placeholder into the first placeholder service.

Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html#/s:17Tex.name: setup(placeholderServices:)
Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html#/s:17Tex.abstract: Allows you to change placeholder services for text view

Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html#/s:17Tex.name: add(placeholderService:)
Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html#/s:17Tex.abstract: Allows you to add new placeholder service

Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html#/s:17Tex.name: setup(heightConstraint:)
Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html#/s:17Tex.abstract: Allows you to set constraint on view height, this constraint will be changed if view height is changed later

Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html#/s:17Tex.name: setup(hint:)
Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html#/s:17Tex.abstract: Allows you to set some string as hint message

Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html#/s:17Tex.name: setup(text:validateText:)
Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html#/s:17Tex.abstract: Allows you to set optional string as text.

Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html#/s:17Tex.name: setTextFieldIdentifier(_:)
Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html#/s:17Tex.abstract: Allows to set accessibilityIdentifier for textView and its internal elements

Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html#/s:17Tex.abstract: Allows to set view in ‘error’ state, optionally allows you to set the error message. If errorMessage is nil - label keeps the previous info message

Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html#/s:17Tex.name: validate(force:)
Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html#/s:17Tex.abstract: Method performs validate logic, updates all UI elements and returns you isValid value

Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html#/s:17Tex.name: reset()

Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html#/s:17Tex.abstract: Reset only error state and update all UI elements

Classes/UnderlinedTextField.html#/s:17Te.name: setup(hint:)
Classes/UnderlinedTextField.html#/s:17Te.abstract: Allows you to set some string as hint message

Classes/UnderlinedTextField.html#/s:17Te.name: setup(text:validateText:)
Classes/UnderlinedTextField.html#/s:17Te.abstract: Allows you to set optional string as text.

Classes/UnderlinedTextField.html#/s:17Te.name: setTextFieldIdentifier(_:)
Classes/UnderlinedTextField.html#/s:17Te.abstract: Allows to set accessibilityIdentifier for textField and its internal elements

Classes/TextFieldValidator.html#/s:17Tex.name: emptyErrorText
Classes/TextFieldValidator.html#/s:17Tex.abstract: Text for error, when input string does not exist

Classes/TextFieldValidator.html#/s:17Tex.name: shortErrorText
Classes/TextFieldValidator.html#/s:17Tex.abstract: Text for error, when input string too short (< minLength)

Classes/TextFieldValidator.html#/s:17Tex.name: largeErrorText
Classes/TextFieldValidator.html#/s:17Tex.abstract: Text for error, when input string too big (> maxLength)

Classes/TextFieldValidator.html#/s:17Tex.name: notValidErrorText
Classes/TextFieldValidator.html#/s:17Tex.abstract: Text for error, when input string does not match a regular expression

Classes/MaskTextFieldFormatter.html#/s:1.name: emptyStringErrorMessage
Classes/MaskTextFieldFormatter.html#/s:1.abstract: Error message for case, when user leave empty text field

Classes/MaskTextFieldFormatter.html#/s:1.name: incorrectStringErrorMessage
Classes/MaskTextFieldFormatter.html#/s:1.abstract: Error message for case, when user leave incorrect text field

Classes/MaskTextFieldFormatter.html#/s:1.name: validate()
Classes/MaskTextFieldFormatter.html#/s:1.abstract: Method returns tuple with isValid flag and errorMessage, if current input state is incorrect

Classes/MaskTextFieldFormatter.html#/s:1.name: format(string:field:)
Classes/MaskTextFieldFormatter.html#/s:1.abstract: Method for formatting passed string with initial mask

Classes/MaskTextFieldFormatter.html#/s:1.name: format(string:)
Classes/MaskTextFieldFormatter.html#/s:1.abstract: Method for formatting with current mask without field

Classes/MaskTextFieldFormatter.html#/s:1.name: delegateForTextField()
Classes/MaskTextFieldFormatter.html#/s:1.abstract: Method returns object, which you must access to delegate property of needed UITextField

Classes/MaskTextFieldFormatter.html#/s:1.name: setListenerToFormatter(listener:)
Classes/MaskTextFieldFormatter.html#/s:1.abstract: Method for setting object as listener to provide processing callbacks of UITextFieldDelegate messages

Classes/PlainPickerView.html#/s:17TextFi.name: view(size:textField:data:)
Classes/PlainPickerView.html#/s:17TextFi.abstract: Method for creating PlainPickerView with specific size, linked textField and custom data

Classes/DatePickerView.html#/s:17TextFie.name: view(size:textField:dateFormat:)
Classes/DatePickerView.html#/s:17TextFie.abstract: Method for creating DatePickerView with specific size, linked textField and custom dateFormat (“dd.MM.yyyy” by default)

Classes/InnerTextField.html#/s:17TextFie.name: resetSecureInput
Classes/InnerTextField.html#/s:17TextFie.abstract: if set to true, the textfield’s default behavior applies:

Classes/InnerDesignableView.html.name: InnerDesignableView
Classes/InnerDesignableView.html.abstract: Inherit custom subview from this class instead of UIView,

Classes/InnerTextField.html.name: InnerTextField
Classes/InnerTextField.html.abstract: Class for UITextField with some extra features, it uses inside custom textFields in the project

Classes/DatePickerView.html.name: DatePickerView
Classes/DatePickerView.html.abstract: Custom input view for text fields with UIDatePicker.

Classes/PlainPickerView.html.name: PlainPickerView
Classes/PlainPickerView.html.abstract: Custom input view for text fields with UIPickerView.

Classes/PickerTopViewConfiguration.html.abstract: Configuration class with parameters for topView into the custom input views with pickers

Classes/PickerTopViewButtonConfiguration.abstract: Configuration class with parameters for topView return and navigations button

Classes/MaskTextFieldFormatter.html.name: MaskTextFieldFormatter
Classes/MaskTextFieldFormatter.html.abstract: Special formatter for input field with mask (work only with text field)

Classes/TextFieldValidator.html.name: TextFieldValidator
Classes/TextFieldValidator.html.abstract: Class for text field validation, includes logic for validation and error text selection.

Classes/LineConfiguration.html.name: LineConfiguration
Classes/LineConfiguration.html.abstract: Configuration class with parameters for line in UnderlinedTextField

Classes/FloatingPlaceholderConfiguration.name: FloatingPlaceholderConfiguration
Classes/FloatingPlaceholderConfiguration.abstract: Configuration class with parameters for floating placeholder

Classes/StaticPlaceholderConfiguration.h.name: StaticPlaceholderConfiguration
Classes/StaticPlaceholderConfiguration.h.abstract: Configuration class with parameters for static placeholders

Classes/TextFieldConfiguration.html.name: TextFieldConfiguration
Classes/TextFieldConfiguration.html.abstract: Configuration class with parameters for inner text field inside custom text fields

Classes/HintConfiguration.html.name: HintConfiguration
Classes/HintConfiguration.html.abstract: Configuration class with parameters for hint label

Classes/PasswordModeConfiguration.html.name: PasswordModeConfiguration
Classes/PasswordModeConfiguration.html.abstract: Configuration class with parameters for tuning action button inside custom text fields

Classes/BackgroundConfiguration.html.name: BackgroundConfiguration
Classes/BackgroundConfiguration.html.abstract: Configuration class with parameters for tuning background color

Classes/ColorConfiguration.html.name: ColorConfiguration
Classes/ColorConfiguration.html.abstract: Configuration class with parameters for tuning color in various text feild states

Classes/FloatingPlaceholderService.html.name: FloatingPlaceholderService
Classes/FloatingPlaceholderService.html.abstract: Default variant of placeholder service which implements logic of floating-placeholder.

Classes/NativePlaceholderService.html.name: NativePlaceholderService
Classes/NativePlaceholderService.html.abstract: Default variant of placeholder service which implements logic of native-placeholder.

Classes/StaticPlaceholderService.html.name: StaticPlaceholderService
Classes/StaticPlaceholderService.html.abstract: Default variant of placeholder service which implements logic of static-placeholder.

Classes/UnderlinedTextField.html.name: UnderlinedTextField
Classes/UnderlinedTextField.html.abstract: Class for custom textField. Contains UITextFiled, top floating placeholder, underline line under textField and bottom label with some info.

Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html.name: UnderlinedTextView
Classes/UnderlinedTextView.html.abstract: Class for custom textView. Contains UITextView, top floating placeholder, underline line under textView and bottom label with some info.
